name: eddies-print-engine (Python 3.11 + Streamlit AutoStart)
postCreateCommand:
python -m pip install --upgrade pip && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt; fi && mkdir -p .streamlit && printf "[server]
port = 8502
address = '0.0.0.0'
enableCORS = false
enableXsrfProtection = false

[browser]
gatherUsageStats = false
" > .streamlit/config.toml && mkdir -p .streamlit && if [ ! -f .streamlit/secrets.toml ]; then printf "STRIPE_SECRET_KEY = ""
STRIPE_PAYMENT_LINK = ""
" > .streamlit/secrets.toml; fi
postStartCommand: bash -lc "(pgrep -f 'streamlit run app.py' >/dev/null) || (nohup streamlit run app.py --server.port 8502 --server.address 0.0.0.0 --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false >/tmp/streamlit.log 2>&1 & disown)"
